timeOut: The time allotted for this test has expired.
waitOver: The waiting time has expired. You can go to the module and repeat the test execution.
waitTimeDesc: There is a waiting time between several attempts to pass the test. Please use this time for additional preparation.
testStartConfirmation: You are about to start taking the test.
timeLimitNotification: The test time is limited and is
serverErrorQuestion: Could not load a test question data from server. Please try again in a few moments or reload this page. If this error persists, please contact the site administrator.
serverErrorAnswer: Could not post a test answer(s) data to the server. Please try again in a few moments or reload this page. If this error persists, please contact the site administrator.
serverErrorFinish: Could not finish the test. Please try again in a few moments or reload this page. If this error persists, please contact the site administrator.
testFinishConfirmation: You are about to end the test execution. At the end of the test, the results will be sent to the server, this operation cannot be undone.
testPassed: You have successfully passed the test by answering the required number of questions correctly.
testFailed: The number of correct answers is not enough to pass the test successfully.
